title: Human Centered Design for Dummies, I mean, Developers
abstract:
"Design Thinking" and "Human Centered Design" have been getting a lot of attention lately. So, what are they, and how are they even relevant to developers? Isn't this something just Designers with a capital "D" use?

In this session, Mahesh will answer these questions and dive deeper into Human Centered Design. He will provide you with enough information, resources, and a set of tools/techniques so you can pretend to be a seasoned Human Centered Design Practitioner in just 45 minutes. 

To get good at HCD will take you longer, but at least you have a starting point...
